about_the_game:
Hellcard - Collector's Content DLC features high-resolution key art with source files, Hellcard's main theme, a collection of R2G avatars, and a full set of thematic wallpapers.

DIGITAL POSTER

High resolution Hellcard Key-art digital poster with source PSD file.

THEMATIC WALLPAPERS

11 thematic wallpapers in 2160p (16:9) and 2400p (16:10) resolutions. All wallpapers are without any logos or overlay text.

R2G AVATARS

17 Return 2 Games and Hellcard avatars in 512x512 high-quality JPG files.

HELLCARD OUTFITS
detailed_description:
Content Location

After installing the DLC, you can find the Collector's Content in the local folder of the game. To navigate there, please right-click on the game in your library and select: Properties -> Local Files -> Browse Local Files.

name: HELLCARD - Collector's Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core or Greater
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible

short_description: Hellcard - Collector's Content DLC features new outfits for your heroes, high-resolution key art with source files, Hellcard's main theme, a collection of R2G avatars, and a full set of thematic wallpapers.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
